p:
The antiviral effect of flavonoids has been tested against numerous viruses such as herpes simplex viruses, hepatitis B and human cytomegalovirus
14, 53, 54 . Additionally, the flavanone NAR presents antiviral activity against viruses from the Flaviviridae family such as HCV, dengue and yellow fever virus strain 17D
17, 18, 55 . It appears that some flavonoids are able to interact with the NS2B-NS3 protease of ZIKV through chemical structures, and they play important roles in the inhibition activities of this protease
28 .
